definition[0]: financial support for an activity or event
example[2]: The expedition is looking for sponsorship from one of the major banks.
definition[1]: the act of sponsoring someone or something, or of being sponsored
definition[2]: financial support given to pay for a sports or arts event, training etc, in exchange for advertising or to get public attention
example[4]: We are looking for sponsorship from local businesses.
example[5]: She plans to raise Â£6,000 in sponsorship.
example[6]: The Olympic committee will raise money from corporate sponsorships, ticket sales and merchandise.
definition[3]: the act of officially supporting a proposal or suggestion
example[7]: The project has benefited from the personal sponsorship of the new technical director.
